name: Night of the Legs
description:
Night of the Legs is a 3D fps game. It's set in an old graveyard forgotten by time. 

Once a year the pumpkins rise from the graves and spread havoc throughout the lands surrounding them. Every time someone unlucky is chosen to fend them off, this year it was you. Your only weapons are a shotgun and a flashlight slowly dying. You'll be somewhat safe as long as you can keep your flashlight on, the pumpkins do not like the light.

How many pumpkins can you destroy before it's too late?
